node._create_table_statement: CREATE TABLE `publicmessages` ( `publicmessages_id` int NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `message_id` int NOT NULL, `msgtext` mediumtext, `tstamp` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, `author_user` int NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`publicmessages_id`), UNIQUE KEY `message_id` (`message_id`), KEY `tstamp_index` (`tstamp`), KEY `author_user` (`author_user`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COLLATE=utf8mb4_0900_ai_ci
node.title: publicmessages
